name: TheDailyBite

skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Stop plugging along and start hashing it out and healing it up. Dana Cohen, MD is a mix of a practicing MD, Jewish Bubala aunt and a modern-day witch doctor. Her mission: to take the best of integrative medicine to the masses and serve it to you like a tasty chicken soup of health and wellness. How? Through delicious daily bites of information that will educate, inspire, motivate and empower you. Why? You will feel better! And who doesn’t want to feel better?

The Daily Bite is 1-2 minutes of important information on everything health and wellness related. From gut health to mind-body medicine to hormones and many things in between. For example, Dr. Cohen might help you learn to ask your senators for better labeling laws on our foods or how to start with 1 minute of breath work a day.

The Daily Bite covers a variety of subjects, including:

 - Functional Medicine
 - Integrative Medicine
 - Complementary Medicine
 - Supplementation
 - Holistic Medicine
 - Health and Wellness
 - Organic Foods
 - Natural Foods
 - Natural Healing
 - And more!

In this world of misinformation, we all could use a little guidance, so The Daily Bite also offers up books, websites, references, etc. on where to get most trusted information and the 911 on the really good, healthy stuff. It also features specialty weeks, focusing on one issue in depth. And it's all wrapped up in easy-to-digest short bites of valuable info that will help you feel and live a better life. For yourself, your family and even your pets.

From Dr. Cohen:

"I'm an Internist practicing for over 20 years in New York City. My focus is on integrative and functional medicine, and I try to put the 'fun' in functional medicine whenever I can. My philosophy is to look for the root cause of illness and guide you to lifestyle and nutritional interventions whenever possible, to get you off and keep you off long term prescription medications. I am on the Scientific Advisory Board of the Organic and Natural Health Association, and am an Advisor to the Board of Directors for ACAM-The American College for the Advancement in Medicine. At ACAM, I help create yearly symposiums that have educated thousands of integrative doctors all over the world. I have published my first book called "Quench" on the new science of hydration from Hachette Book Group in 2018. It was featured in the New York Times and O Magazine and has been translated into 6 languages."

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
